PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-02652022-03-25,  ,  FIN,  , 
ActIncome Tax Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Income Tax Regulations (COVID-19 — Twenty-sixth Qualifying Period)
PrecisRegulations amending the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS (COVID-19 — TWENTY-SIXTH QUALIFYING PERIOD) in order to temporarily expand the Canada Emergency Wage Subsidy (CEWS) and Canada Emergency Rent Subsidy (CERS) for entities subject to a public health order that restricts capacity by at least 50% from February 13, 2022 to March 12, 2022.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0068 Publication Date: 2022-04-13
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Income Tax Regulations (COVID-19 — Twenty-sixth Qualifying Period)
precis: Regulations amending the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS (COVID-19 — TWENTY-SIXTH QUALIFYING PERIOD) in order to temporarily expand the Canada Emergency Wage Subsidy (CEWS) and Canada Emergency Rent Subsidy (CERS) for entities subject to a public health order that restricts capacity by at least 50% from February 13, 2022 to March 12, 2022.
